result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel A. Blevins

records.addlTxt: 09:48 AM in Room 301. Defendant Daniel A. Blevins in court.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def. wishes to represent himself. Waiver of attorney form reviewed. Def. understands. Court finds Def. has waived right to an attorney, finds competent and will allow to represent self. Waiver of time limits for P.H. already entered. Def. understands what a P.H. is. Def. wants to begin negotiations. Court will accept as waiver of P.H. if not already done.  Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on June 10, 2022 at 09:45 am.
No driving a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

02:03 PM Defendant Daniel A. Blevins in court.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty. Def. doesn't want an atty.  Court goves over waiver of atty rights with def.  Court finds waiver is freely & voluntarily given.  Def. waives time limits for p.h.  Court accepts waiver of time limits for p.h.  State gives bail/bond recommendation. Court orders $200 cash bond with condition posted by 4:30 today.  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 11:00 am.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+)
